title: The role of Helicobacter pylori in augmenting the severity of SARS-CoV-2 related gastrointestinal symptoms: An insight from molecular mechanism of co-infection
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Akrati Tandon, Budhadev Baral, Vaishali Saini, Meenakshi Kandpal, Amit Kumar Dixit, Hamendra Singh Parmar, Ajay Kumar Meena, Hem Chandra Jha
